label.phrase: the government of turkey consistently reports that the pkk as an organization is responsible for much of the illicit drug processing and trafficking in turkey turkish press reports state that the pkk produces 60 tons of heroin per year and receives an estimated income of forty million dollars each year from drug trafficking proceeds
